introduction:
It was founded at the end of 1998, headquartered in Hangzhou,
		 and set up overseas branches in Silicon Valley, London and other places.
		 It is a well-known brand of global business-to-business (B2B) e-commerce
		 and is currently the world's largest online trade market.

It is an Internet company co-founded by Ma Huateng, Zhang Zhidong,
		 Xu Chenye, Chen Yidan and Zeng Liqing in November 1998.
		 It is one of the largest comprehensive Internet service providers in China
		 and one of the Internet companies serving the most users in China.
		 Headquartered in Shenzhen

It is known for producing the action game "Honkai" series and
		 "Genshin", among which the open world action role-playing game "Genshin" released in 2020
		 it is one of the highest-grossing mobile games in history.
